excerpt: "New cameras kept on coming over the summer months, including Sony’s new α6700, which featured AI object recognition and tracking. It features a 26MP sensor capable of the now obligatory 4K 120fps frame rate, as well as SLog3 and S-Cinetone derived from the company’s cinema line of cameras."
